title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing geese in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing geese in a dream: Geese are birds that resemble ducks and are classified as waterfowl. They are large in size because they are much larger than ducks because geese have long necks and loud voices. Interpretation of a dream about geese, Ibn Sirin will have a different interpretation of seeing a goose in a dream than Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. Each of them will have their own opinion on the interpretation of this dream, and today all the details will be available through our article. Interpretation of a dream about geese by Ibn Sirin Geese in a dream is evidence of the birth of a child. The sound of geese in a dream is a sign of sadness and anxiety. Going fishing in a dream is an indication of wealth. Seeing geese above the pioneer’s head is evidence of the dreamer’s promotion of his business. Interpretation of a dream about geese for a single woman. Geese in one’s dream is evidence of the happy news that she will receive. Seeing a flock of geese at sea indicates the girl’s success in her life. Geese in a flock is evidence of travel. Seeing goose feathers in a dream Evidence of marriage soon. If you see black goose feathers a sign of unpleasant things, this is evidence of separation and alienation. White goose feathers are heralds of marriage to a rich man. Interpretation of a dream about married geeseSeeing geese in a married woman’s dream is a sign of good news and good news. Geese In a dream for a married woman, it is evidence of fertility. Plucking goose feathers is evidence of disappointment and failure. Seeing roasted geese is a sign of anxiety and problems. Buying a goose in a dream is a pleasant vision for a married woman. Geese are a sign of travel. Seeing white in a dream is a sign of happy events. Black geese are a sign of hatred and jealousy. Interpretation of a dream about geese for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant goose in a dream is evidence of healing, the disappearance of stress, and the elimination of tension. Seeing white geese is evidence of the presence of a girl. Seeing black and gray geese in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the presence of a male. Seeing geese while he is Running in a dream is evidence of loss of pain and exhaustion during childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about geese for a man: A goose in a man’s dream is a sign of money and great respect. The presence of geese in the house is evidence of the blessing that the fortuneteller has found. The appearance of a goose on the seer’s lap is a sign of nourishment and good news. The decline of geese is an indication of the blessing that the fortuneteller has found. A sign of good news. Interpretation of seeing small geese in a dream. Geese in a dream indicate beautiful women with money. It is also a vision of happy and joyful news that the boss hears. There is good news in saving money, children, work, or other things. Interpretation of seeing a white goose in a dream. Seeing white geese is better. Much for me, and I believe that a married woman is an indicator of the stability of her life. It also contains a reference to nutrition, goodness, divination, money and happiness. Buying and selling geese in a dream Selling a goose in a dream generally indicates a woman’s marriage to someone authorized or prohibited according to the condition of the fortuneteller, and whoever sees it working Selling a live goose in a dream may be a sign of a woman, and whoever sees that he is working on selling a slaughtered goose in a dream, this indicates the woman’s marriage. Raising a goose in a dream indicates raising girls, but feeding a goose

title: Interpretation of a bird in a dream

preview.html: Interpreting a bird in a dream is one of the topics that concerns many of us. The interpretation of seeing a bird in a dream has many meanings and interpretations that indicate it, and the meaning of the dream varies according to the dreamer’s circumstances, as they differ according to psychological, health, and social circumstances. The vision is good, but sometimes it indicates unpleasant things, so we try in the following article through the encyclopedia to clarify some interpretations of seeing a bird in a dream. Interpretation of a bird in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Seeing a bird in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and indicates goodness and happiness for the dreamer. Who sees birds In pajamas and screaming loudly over the house or somewhere, this is one of the unwanted visions that indicate the death of a person who lives in the place where there are birds. Seeing a person carrying birds on his back in a dream, this was a sign of the problems that the person faces in his life. If someone sees that he is holding a bird in his hands, this is a sign of kindness and that the dreamer will receive a lot of money. Seeing a bird in a dream, with someone standing on its head, means that a person will satisfy his desires, that many benefits and praiseworthy things will happen, and that he will achieve Many desires that he seeks. Interpretation of a bird in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing unknown birds in a dream may indicate the death of the dreamer, but seeing birds picking worms from the ground means the death of one of the dreamer’s relatives. Seeing a bird catching worms from your head means that you will travel to a place Far, as seeing waterfowl swimming in the water indicates that the dreamer will have a lot of good things and that he will obtain an excellent position in a coin. When a person sees in a dream that he is eating bird meat, this dream means that the dreamer will receive a lot of money. If a bird falls into the dreamer's hand in the dream or falls on his head, it means a lot of money. Seeing pigeons hunting in a dream means a lot of good for the dreamer and getting what he wants. A person who sees in a dream that birds enter his house in a flock, means the presence of people Intruders in the dreamer's life are trying to invade his life and privacy. If one sees in a dream that a bird is trying to attack him forcefully, then this dream means that the dreamer is fickle and unstable in his faith. Seeing bird feathers in a dream is considered a praiseworthy vision, which means that the dreamer will gain a lot of Money in a short time without effort. Seeing a bird's nest in a dream bodes well for the dreamer because it indicates that he will find a new job opportunity or will be promoted to a higher position. When a person sees brightly colored birds in a dream, it means hearing good and happy news about the dreamer. If one sees that he is carrying birds on His back, this indicates fatigue and problems that the dreamer is suffering from, and a bird standing on the top of a hill means that he will get rid of problems and have many good things. His life.Whoever sees in a dream powerful birds such as the hawk and the eagle, shows the dreamer’s strength, and if he sees that he is eating their meat, this means that he will receive a lot of money from one of them. a

title: Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream: Eating onions in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of onions for a single, married, and pregnant girl, whether peeled or peeled, red, white, green, or dry green, Ibn Sirin buys onions. Interpretation of a dream about onions. Onions in a dream mean revealing secrets and being exposed to scandals, and white onions indicate great sadness and stinginess. As for red onions, they are a sign of dawn, and this is unpopular. If one sees a rotten onion, this means that there is a bad neighbor close to you, as well as a miserable husband for the wife. But if this rotten onion appears in the dream of a sick person, this is evidence that he will be completely cured of this disease and recover in the end. Interpretation of onions in a dream is evidence of fatigue and hardship. Seeing onions, garlic or balls carries a similar sign and reveals secrets. Seeing yourself peeling onions in a dream means vanity and flattery, especially in men's dreams. White onions in a dream symbolize a year full of sadness and fatigue, waste or squandering of money, fatigue, hardship, effort and toil. White onions symbolize an arrogant, miserable or unjust person. Seeing white onions in a woman's dream means bad words, bad deeds, false pregnancy, questionable money, envy, malice or hatred. As for red onions in a dream, they indicate evil, evil and immorality. A man's vision of red onions in his dream symbolizes the good or sustenance he acquires in old age or gives birth to a son after gray hair. Seeing red onions in a woman's dream symbolizes a man who has no religion, is immoral or drunk. As for seeing dry onions in a dream, it is a jealous neighbor, a treacherous friend, a stingy husband, an illness from which the dreamer will recover soon, or the death of a dear and close person to the dreamer. The single girl means marriage with many problems and troubles, but in general it is a good marriage. As for the meaning of seeing peeling onions in the dream of an unmarried girl, it symbolizes an arrogant husband who is not appreciated or an engagement that is cut off at the right time, or indicates false news or gossip. As for the married woman who peels onions in her dream, this may indicate a false pregnancy or something incomplete. As for the pregnant woman, seeing an onion peeled in her dream indicates labor and childbirth soon. As for the interpretation of a man’s dream of peeling onions while he is asleep, it is a sign of exhaustion and unhappiness, whether on the material level or at work, meeting or marriage. As for the unmarried girl who dreams that she is cutting onions into small pieces, this means that the girl will overcome the difficulties in her life and may announce her marriage soon. As for the pregnant woman to see as if she is cutting onions in a dream, this foretells that her pregnancy will end soon, her aches and pains will go away, and her eyes will be cool with the newborn. As for the married woman who dreams that she is cutting onions into small pieces, this It portends the nutrition of the married woman, the success of her children, the provision of abundant money, economic, financial and social stability, stability and reassurance in married life, the justice of the husband and a decent and comfortable standard of living.

As for a pregnant woman, seeing an onion being peeled in her dream indicates labor and childbirth soon. As for the interpretation of a man’s dream of peeling onions during his sleep, it is a sign of exhaustion. And unhappiness, whether on the financial level, at work, meeting, or marriage. As for an unmarried girl who dreams that she is cutting onions into small pieces, this means that the girl will overcome difficulties in her life and may announce her marriage soon. As for a pregnant woman, she sees as if she is chopping Onions in a dream, this foretells to her that her pregnancy will end soon, her aches and pains will go away, and her eyes will be cold with the new baby. As for a married woman who dreams that she is cutting onions into small pieces, this foretells the married woman’s nutrition, the success of her children, the provision of abundant funds, and stability. Economic, financial and social, stability and reassurance in marital life, justice of the husband and a decent and comfortable standard of living.

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing an engagement ring in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of an engagement ring in a dream: Wearing an engagement ring for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man, if the bride’s network is lost, removing the engagement ring from someone you love, according to Ibn Sirin and other more detailed interpretations in the appendix to the article below. Interpretation of wearing an engagement ring in a dream: Wearing a boy’s ring Or a girl / symbol of marriage, indicating the status of the individual. To dream of wearing an engagement ring is good news for engagement and soon marriage, God willing. Engagement ring in a dream. It is one of the dreams that many people see, especially those who are about to get married or engaged, because of the constant thought of engagement and the opportunity to marry someone the dreamer loves in public life. In general, we will explain to you in our interpretations, as our great translator Ibn Sirin explains in all his interpretations, about the different dreams that we constantly go through in order to get the correct interpretation.Interpretation of an engagement ring in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing an engagement ring in a dream. This is evidence that the dreamer will receive a lot of good news in the coming days, and that his circumstances will change for the better, God willing. Seeing the Internet in our dreams indicates that the dreamer will be able to achieve many of his dreams in the near future, including starting a profitable business that will make him happy. As required. Seeing a gold network in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will gain great influence in public life. Also, seeing the engagement network being lost in a dream means that the dreamer will suffer from some problems, as he will enter into a great and very strong sadness, but in the event that the network breaks In a dream, this is evidence of the death of one of our relatives in the near future. Just as the net was lost in our dreams and was not found, this is evidence that the dreamer must be careful in all his future decisions and all his assumptions must be completely reconsidered before making any decision. The dream suggests that the dreamer is being deceived by a close person, and you should review relationships. Interpretation of an engagement ring in one dreamSeeing an engagement ring in a single woman’s dream means that she will achieve her goals and dreams in the near future and will also receive a lot of good and happy news. Seeing a married woman wearing a married woman In a dream, there is evidence of pregnancy soon, and she will receive goodness from her husband, but if she receives a gold net from her husband in a dream, this is evidence of her stability. From the circumstances of her home, she will recover and get rid of all problems soon. Also, seeing a married woman taking a diamond network in a dream is evidence that her children will be very successful, while if the network breaks, this is evidence of the misfortunes that will befall her. YouTube Interpretation of an engagement ring in a dream Collected Translation by many sites and I am not the translator, my dear brother

title: The 8 most important interpretations of seeing a murder in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing beatings to death and death in a dream? It shows bad decisions. What does it mean for a man to see in a dream someone who wants to kill him? This indicates that there is a person in his life who is pursuing him. What is the interpretation of seeing a murder in a married woman’s dream? Evidence of fear and anxiety about her life. Marital. Interpretation of seeing a murder in a pregnant woman’s dream? Elements of easy and affordable childbirth. What is the interpretation of seeing success in murder? Evidence of the position that the fortuneteller will obtain. Interpretation of a dream of murder by Ibn Sirin. Murder in a dream is a victory over enemies and good for the pioneer. Seeing a person in a dream Not killing, this indicates that the dreamer has not achieved what he wants. After that, seeing success in killing is evidence of a status that the god will reach. Seeing the difficulty of killing in a dream is evidence that this person will face some difficulties. Killing in a dream indicates food and spoils. Then, being beaten to death in a dream indicates bad decisions. Seeing a dream about killing Nabulsi. Killing in a dream may indicate disputes and disputes between the dreamer and one of his relatives. Therefore, seeing a murder in a dream could be a sign of escaping reality. It could mean killing in A dream about taking revenge on someone. So, seeing someone killed in a dream is evidence of escaping that person in reality. Murder may indicate abandoning some bad habits. Interpretation of a dream about killing a man. If you see a man murdered in a dream, it means regret and making bad decisions. It may also indicate a long period of sadness. If you see a young man in a dream that he is committing a murder, this indicates the emptying of some energy within him and also indicates his success. Whoever tries to defend himself by killing, this indicates success and changing a person’s life for the better. Then Seeing a man in a dream that someone wants to kill him, this indicates that there is someone in his life waiting for him. If one dreams that he is killing someone, this is a sign of victory over enemies. Then a man sees in a dream that he is killing his mother and father, this indicates many changes that It will happen in his life. Then seeing slaughter for the sake of God is a means of divine sustenance that he receives. Seeing a dream of killing a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream of many murders is evidence of the loss of a loved one. Then seeing a murder in a married woman’s dream indicates fear and anxiety for her life. Marital. Murder in a married woman’s dream may indicate disagreements with her husband that may lead to separation. Interpretation of a dream about killing a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is murder, and this means that she will endure the pain of childbirth and will face all the problems she is exposed to throughout the pregnancy and during childbirth. So, Seeing a murder in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of an easy and affordable birth.

title: Interpretation of the neck in a dream for a single woman, complete correct interpretations

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of an earring in a dream for a single woman. All girls want to have an earring as one of the accessories that decorates the girl’s ear and increases her beauty. There are those who like to wear gold earrings and those who like to wear silver ones. An unmarried girl can see in her dream that she is wearing or buying an earring, or that someone is leading her to it, and she admires this vision and searches for a logical explanation for it, through the following lines in an encyclopedia. We will give the interpretation of an unmarried woman’s dream of an earring. Interpretation of the neck in a dream for a single woman. An earring in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes that she will hear happy news that she has been waiting for for a long time. One of the most promising visions for a single girl is her dream that she touches her neck, and this means that there is a lot of good on her way. To her.If an unmarried woman dreams that a girl she knows is wearing a beautiful earring and she loves it, then her dreams indicate that she is not satisfied with what she has and she is always looking at what others have.Forgetting the neck in a dream of an unmarried woman portends the possibility of failure in her professional and emotional life. An unmarried girl who is late for marriage and is wearing a beautiful golden earring in a dream foretells her engagement and marriage. Whoever dreams that she is wearing a silver earring, this vision indicates that she is engaged to a man with good morals. An iron or copper neck in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she will be exposed to crises and problems. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing an earring, but she took it off because she did not like it, this means that she will propose to a young man, but she will leave him because she will not love him. title: Interpretation of a dream in which the same person repeats himself in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream in which the same person repeats in a dream in detail, when a person sees in a dream a specific person, where he certainly becomes curious to know the interpretation of this vision, but what if the dreamer sees that person who he saw previously appeared in a dream more than once, and there is no doubt that this will cause He is confused and thinks a lot, and therefore he tries to discover whether this repetition has real connections or is just obsessions and dreams, and we will learn an explanation for this by providing the interpretation of a dream in which the same person repeats it in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream in which the same person repeats it for young people. There is no doubt that repeating the vision of a specific person in a dream when he was young It can carry with it many signs, symbols, and associations, and through these lines this matter becomes clear: If a young man sees a person in his dream and does not show interest in him, he even ignores him more than once. The vision indicates the dreamer’s behavior on the path of deviation and annulment, except for his sins, transgressions, and misdeeds. This vision also expresses the presence of many negative and bad qualities in the person who sees it. Whereas if the person whom the dreamer saw more than once in his dream is unknown, this indicates that this person is thinking about the dreamer. So that he can arrange a specific matter for him, but it is not possible Separate the classification of this scale, whether it is good or bad. If a young man sees in a dream that he is at odds with his friend, and as a result, disputes and disagreements arose between them in the dream. This vision was a sign of the loss of his friend in reality. Interpretation of a dream in which the same person repeats himself in a dream in detailSee Also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing money taken from an unknown person in a dream. Interpretation of the recurring dream of a specific person on a man. The people whom the dreamer sees in the dream differ. Some of them are known to the dreamer, and on the contrary, others are unknown and the dreamer knows nothing about them, and the interpretation of that is as we will explain in the following: If a man sees in his dream that he is fighting and arguing with his friend, this may indicate the dreamer’s failure to enter into an investment plan. In addition, this vision indicates the wrong choice of the person who will participate in one of his projects. Whereas if one sees in his dream a well-known young man and ignores him, This vision carries a sign that the dreamer will lose all his money. If the man sees in a dream that his manager is planning something bad for him. This vision will certainly indicate that the dreamer will leave his job and thus cut off his livelihood from this work. What the dreamer must do is give up Intrigues against him and trying to find an alternative job. Interpretation of a dream in which the same person repeats himself in a dream in detail. See also: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin is seeing shame on someone you love. Interpretation of the repetition of a specific person in a dream for a married woman. Among the dreams that cause anxiety and questioning in a woman’s dream is that she sees a specific person more than once, Therefore, the clear interpretation is as follows: If the person whom the married woman saw in a dream more than once is her husband and he gives her a gift. There is no doubt that this indicates the appearance and manifestation of pregnancy for this woman, and this is in the very near future. If the married woman sees that one of her friends or Her relatives did not appear

title: A detailed interpretation of an earthquake in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of the earthquake in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that the earth shook with a severe disturbance in the sky, then this dream means that the people of the country or place are being punished by the Sultan and may suffer from illness, poverty, or distress. As for who sees the earthquake? It fell to the ground, and indeed the walls and partitions collapsed and the interpretation The dream, and God knows best, is a real death that befalls people, perhaps as a result of their actions. As for whoever sees that the earthquake occurred and destroyed a group or that a group handed over the land to another group, the dream here indicates that the ruler or president will descend to the place and torture even his companions, by God. He knows better. Whoever sees that the ground has already shaken, locusts, lice, and frogs are spreading. Unfortunately, there is a danger to the villagers, and God knows best. It may be due to the large number of sins in it. As for those who see the barren and barren bodies shaking, the earthquake here means that the earth will be fertilized and growth will occur again. Interpretation Ibn Sirin for earthquakesIbn Sirin explains that earthquakes are always strong and stormy, so whoever sees in his dream that there is a mountain that has been exposed to earthquakes, but settled again in interpreting the dream that misfortunes and misfortunes will happen to the country and specifically to the country. The inhabitants of this place, but the village and the ruler may survive after that when he repopulates the mountain. As for the one who hears the sound of the clouds with the earthquake, the dream here refers to the owners of the area. The people of evil and disobedience are large and large. Meanings and Symbols of Seeing an EarthquakeIf the patient sees an earthquake occurring, it usually The interpretation of the dream is that the sick person will die. But if the barren land shakes, the land will soon grow and blossom. However, if the earth shakes and the sky is disturbed, the dream often indicates devastation or devastation and death for the inhabitants of that area, and God knows best. An earthquake in a dream usually indicates, if it Dreaming in May, indicates a violent quarrel or disaster between people. But if the earthquake is seen in the dream in June, the dream indicates reconciliation between the two quarrels and the end of strife and evil. But if the dream of seeing an earthquake is in July, then the earthquake here indicates the death of someone Celebrities, rulers, politicians, or a person with great status. Seeing earthquakes in a dream is not good, as the consequences are only in a few places, but in the end they are interpretations and jurisprudence of scholars, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing.

title: I dreamed that my husband married Ali and I was wronged. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation?

preview.html: What does it mean when I dreamed that my husband married Ali and I was being persecuted? One of the dreams that frightens many women is seeing her husband marrying her and immediately starting the journey of searching for an accurate interpretation of this dream. We are on an Egyptian website that provides you with the most accurate interpretations of dreams. Just follow along.I dreamed that my husband married Ali and I was being oppressed. A woman who is suffering from her husband’s marriage in reality may see this dream and with it she may suffer from some psychological symptoms such as night terrors, constant panic and a feeling of oppression, so this dream may be a description of the dreamer’s details. Her life and her painful experience in reality. The factor of jealousy and intense love for the husband pushes the woman to this dream. Psychologists say that she will see her husband marrying her, and at other times she will see him flirting with another woman or meeting other women without her knowledge. All of these dreams stem from feelings of fear of the husband entering into any other love relationship and staying away from the wife because of that. If a woman sees her husband concluding a marriage contract in a dream and he signs the marriage contract and takes the Qur’an from a woman, then the dream is disturbing. The jurists said that the married man who signs the contracts In a dream, it is largely interpreted as a second marriage, and the acquisition of a new Qur’an in his dream that is different from the Qur’an in his home confirms his entry into a new relationship. It should be noted that dreams are important, but there must be evidence of the husband’s marriage in reality so that the dreamer can have. Verify the validity of the vision. I dreamed that my husband married Ali and that Ibn Shirin was persecuting me. Ibn Sirin said that the symbol of a husband marrying another woman is never a cause for fear, but rather it is an indication of the entry of a new source of livelihood into that man’s life. If the husband marries a beautiful, bright and happy woman in Dreaming, his career will be more famous and better than it was. When the dreamer sees her husband celebrating his marriage in a loud wedding party full of singing and dancing, she should be afraid after this dream because it is pioneering and indicates painful events that will come to her husband in the future, especially if he sees. She dances and cheers with the bride, but if she gives alms with the intention of protecting the Lord of the Worlds for her husband and avoiding trials, then God will remove the evil of this dream from their married life. If he sees him marrying a dead woman and he is happy with his marriage to her, then God will grant him many blessings and goodness and restore hope in his life again and all What he lost in the past and lost hope. He will come to him, God willing. The most important 20 interpretations of seeing a husband marrying his wife in a dream. I dreamed that my husband married Ali and I was crying. A woman asked about the interpretation of my husband’s dream that he married Ali and I was crying. The interpreter told her that crying in a dream is a good sign and indicates comfort and the removal of sadness and anguish, but on the condition that she does not scream or raise her voice from crying, knowing that the happy events that will come to her will befall her. Be as follows: Whether or not: God will provide her with financial relief, and if she is suffering from the hardships that have plagued her life for a long time, they will be taken out of her way, and money will come to her from where she least expects. Second: If her husband is suffering from health distress and is always complaining of weakness and illness This dream can reassure her that it will happen

title: Interpretation of a dream about a girl sweeping in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a girl sweeping in a dream. We will present through the following some indicators that express the interpretation of a dream about a girl sweeping in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and translators, not the personality. Rulings. Interpretation of a dream about a girl sweeping in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a girl sweeping in a dream can lead to good behavior for the girl, and God knows the unseen. However, seeing sweeping and cleaning the house in a dream may indicate the benefit that you will reap, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself sweeping the neighbor’s house, this may indicate that On your marriage to the neighbor’s son, and God knows best. If a single girl is seen sweeping the stairs, this may indicate getting rid of worry, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a girl running away from me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a girl running away from me in a dream could express some problems that you can overcome, and God knows best, since if The dreamer saw someone running away from him in a dream, this may be a sign that he is able to control things and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a young man sees someone running away from him in a dream, this could be evidence of wisdom and control over certain matters, and God knows the unseen. In the event that he sees A married man, someone running away from him in a dream, can express overcoming problems and God knows everything. Interpretation of a dream of a girl flying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a girl flying in a dream can indicate marriage and that God has all knowledge. If an unmarried girl sees flying in a dream, it may be a travel sign. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees herself flying without wings in a dream, this may be a sign of bad changes, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself flying in a dream, he can express the changes that are happening to him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a girl taking off her hijab in a dream. Interpretation A girl dreams of taking off her hijab in a dream. Perhaps taking off her hijab will benefit her, and God knows best. When you see taking off the hijab in a dream, it could be a sign of kindness and opening doors, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees taking off the hijab in a dream, it may be a sign of committing sins, and God knows best. When you see an unmarried girl taking off her hijab. In a dream, this may indicate some wrong behavior, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my son running away from me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my son running away from me in a dream. A child running away could express the danger threatening the son, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a son running away may express danger to the son, and God knows best. The UnseenWhen a married woman sees her son running in a dream, this may be a sign of danger to the son, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man sees his son running in a dream, this may be a sign of danger to the son, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my wife running away from me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my wife running away from me in a dream. A dream could indicate the stress and tension that she experiences with her husband, and God knows the unseen. When I see my wife running away from me in a dream, it could be a sign of disagreements, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married man sees his wife running away from him in a dream, this may indicate disagreements and problems, and God knows best. When you see yourself leaving Your husband lost his life
